home.title: Intelligent Drug Discovery Accelerator
home.subtitle: Innovation Laboratory
home.description: Integrating artificial intelligence, computational biology and molecular design technologies to accelerate the new drug discovery process and contribute breakthrough force to human health.
home.subtitle2: Integrating computational drug design, molecular simulation and artificial intelligence technologies to build the next generation drug discovery ecosystem
home.drugDesignDesc: AI-based molecular design and optimization, accurately predicting molecular interactions, accelerating lead compound discovery
home.teamCollaborationDesc: Interdisciplinary team collaboration, integrating professional knowledge in biology, chemistry, and computer science
home.academicAchievementsDesc: High-quality paper publication and patent applications, promoting deep exchange and cooperation between academia and industry
home.toolDevelopmentDesc: Open source software tool development, serving the global scientific research community, promoting technology popularization and application
home.newsDescription: Learn about the latest research progress, academic achievements and important activities of the laboratory
home.advanceDrugDiscovery: Advance the Drug Discovery Revolution Together
home.joinDescription: If you are passionate about computational drug design and the application of artificial intelligence in biomedicine, welcome to join our innovative team and create the future of pharmaceutical technology together
